content.body: Domenic: hola, thinking about what to do with prefetch... the PR tries to at least capture the common denominator, I'm feeling unable to get the different stakeholders to discuss something that would warrant a change in implementation

content.body: Noam Rosenthal: replied on the issue, and wrapping up the week here... but yeah, I think I'm worried about this "common denominator" strategy, that seems like another word for "doesn't match any browser and thus shouldn't be merged". (But I guess maybe it matches Firefox and Safari, actually?)

content.body: Domenic: I talked to the loading folks at chrome internally about removing the 5-minute rule, will discuss separately about `as=document`, I believe the consensus earlier was to remove it in favor of nav-speculation but will double check
